name: Ninja Mission Run 3D
description:
Get your hands on the treasure and run as fast as you can to navigate through a maze of booby traps in order to get out alive before the monsters kill you.

One of the most exhilarating running game on the App Store. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and and see how far you can run!

FEATURES

* Simple swipe and tilt controls that are easy to use and just feel right
* Level up your character.
* Original 3D running mechanic combining turning, jumping, sliding and tilting.
* Play as 3 different characters!
* Incredibly fun, just one more time, endless game play!
